Description: [Weapon] Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=5|5}%.
ShortDesc: [Weapon] Reload faster.

Description: [Rend Soul] Reduce the Cooldown of Rend Soul by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.
ShortDesc: [Rend Soul] Reduce the Cooldown of Rend Soul.

Description: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% for 4s after getting a Killing Blow or Elimination.
ShortDesc: [Armor] Kills grant MS

Description: [Agility] Heal for {scale=20|20} every 1s while Agility is active.
ShortDesc: [Agility] Heal yourself while Agility is active.

Description: [Rapid Shot] Each arrow of Rapid Shot reduces the Movement Speed of any enemy hit by {scale=5|5}% for 2s.
ShortDesc: [Rapid Shot] Rapid Shot arrows now reduce enemies' movement speed.

Description: [Scamper] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=8|8}% while using Scamper.
[Crouching Tigron] Reset the Cooldown of Crouching Tigron after falling to or below {scale=15|15}% Health.
[Shatterfall] Increase the leap distance of Shatterfall by {scale=10|10}%.
ShortDesc: [Shatterfall] Increase the leap distance of Shatterfall.

Description: [Harpoon] Harpoon lodges into terrain and explodes when an enemy comes within 20 units, dealing 1000 damage in a 35-unit-radius area.
[Grumpy Bomb] Reduces the time it takes for Grumpy Bomb to explode by 40%.
ShortDesc: Grumpy Bomb explodes faster.

Description: [SMGS] Generate 1 Energy for every 80 damage done with your Submachine Guns.
ShortDesc: Dealing damage with SMGs restores Stamina.

Description: [Shield] Your Shield has an infinite duration and its Cooldown is reduced by 2s.
ShortDesc: Your Shield has an infinite Duration

Description: [Advance] Advance gains a 3rd charge and activating Advance while standing still causes you to jet upwards.
ShortDesc: Advance gains an extra charge, standing still causes Ruckus to jet upwards.

Description: [Rend Soul] Rend Soul Stuns enemies for 1.5s when they are afflicted with 4 Soul Charges.
ShortDesc: Rend Soul now stuns the victim when they are afflicted with 4 Soul Charges.

Description: [Grace] Reduce the Cooldown of Grace by 1s and cause Grace to hit all enemies in front of you instead of only one.
ShortDesc: Grace now hits all enemies in front of you, and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: [Turret] Increase the damage of your Turrets by 20% and reduce their Cooldown by 3s.
ShortDesc: Turrets now deal more damage, and have a faster Cooldown.

Description: [Shoulder Bash] Reduce your damage taken by 75% while using Shoulder Bash.
ShortDesc: Gain Damage Reduction while Channeling Shoulder Bash.

Description: [Disengage] For 4s after hitting an enemy with Disengage, your weapon shots deal an additional 8% of that enemy's maximum Health as damage.
ShortDesc: After hitting an enemy with Disengage, subsequent shots will deal an additional percent of their max Health in damage for 6s.

Description: [Weapon] Star Splitter now deals 360 damage every 0.4s.
ShortDesc: Star Splitter fires slower and deals more damage.

Description: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your weapon shots increases the damage they take from weapon shots by 80 for 3s, stacking up to 3 times.
ShortDesc: Weapon shots deal increasing damage.

Description: [Cyclone Strike] Cyclone Strike deals 115% of its target's maximum Health as damage over its duration and your Movement Speed is increased by 15% during the attack.
ShortDesc: [Cyclone Strike] Cyclone Strike now deals 100% of target's health as damage over its duration.

Description: [Sensor Drone] Your Sensor Drones explode, dealing 600 damage and applying a Knockback to those hit when an enemy is within 20 units.
ShortDesc: If an enemy is close to your Sensor Drone, it explodes dealing damage and knocking back

Description: [Weapon] Detonating a Magic Mark also damages all enemies within 15 units of the victim for 75% of its damage.
ShortDesc: Detonating Magic Mark deals damage in an area.

Description: [Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap deals 600 damage and applies a Knockback to enemies within 20 units of your landing location.
ShortDesc: Heroic Leap now deals damage and knocks up enemies near where you land.

Description: [Recovery] Using Recovery instantly Heals you for 600 and increases your maximum Health by 300 for 5s.
ShortDesc: Recovery heals for an additional amount instantly and increases your maximum Health.

Description: [Fire Bomb] Fire Bomb deals 30% increased damage, Cripples enemies caught in it, and applies a 60% reduce healing effect.
ShortDesc: Fire Bomb now Cripples enemies, deals more damage, and applies a reduced healing effect

Description: [Weapon] Switch your rifle to Three-Shot-Burst mode, increasing your effective range and firing three 220-damage shots every 0.4s.
ShortDesc: Battle Rifle

Description: [Hustle] Heal for 300 per second while using Hustle.
ShortDesc: Heal during Hustle.

Description: [Prowl] Increase the damage of each of your daggers from your first dagger sets within 5s of Prowl ending by 30%.
ShortDesc: Deal more damage from your first two Weapon Shots after Prowl ends.

Description: [Explosive Flask] Enemies hit with Explosive Flask take 30% increased damage from your weapon shots for 3s.
ShortDesc: Targets hit with Explosive Flask take increased damage from your Weapon Shots for 3s.

Description: [Detonate] Hitting with more than one Sticky Bomb on a use of Detonate increases the damage of each explosion after the first by 30% of its base damage, up to 150%.
ShortDesc: When hitting an enemy with multiple bombs, each bomb after the first deals more damage.

Description: [Kindle Soul] Kindle Soul Heals up to 15% additional Health based on your ally's missing Health and its range is increased by 300%.
[Weapon] Potion Launcher also Heals allies hit for 700.
ShortDesc: Hitting an ally with Healing Potion increases your attack speed.

Description: [Fire Spit] Fire Spit applies a Knockback and deals an additional 300 damage over 2s.
ShortDesc: Fire Spit now knocks back and deals additional damage over 2s.

Description: [Weapon] Talon Rifle now applies an additional 50 damage over 3s to enemies hit, stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on hit, but you are now unable to get headshots.
ShortDesc: Decreases base damage and adds dot to talon rifle shots.

Description: [Shatterfall] Shatterfall Stuns enemies hit for 1s, but no longer Slows.
ShortDesc: Shatterfall now stuns enemies, but no longer slows.

Description: [Weapon] Your Revolver becomes automatic, dealing 600 damage every 0.5s.
ShortDesc: Automatic fire revolver

Description: [Abyssal Reconstruction] Your Marked ally gains 15% Crowd Control reduction, 10% Cooldown reduction, 15% Reload Speed increase, and they are Healed for 50 every 1s.
ShortDesc: Base buff-while-marked talent

Description: [Weapon] Your weapon shots deal 680 damage every 0.7s, but your Ammo count is reduced.
ShortDesc: Your Weapon deals more damage, but fires more slowly and has a reduced ammo count.

Description: [Poison Bolts] Increase the damage done by Poison Bolts by 25% and the rate at which they deal damage by 100%.
ShortDesc: Poison Bolts deals more damage, twice as fast.

Description: [Calamity Blast] Each Calamity Blast deals an additional 100 damage.
ShortDesc: Calamity Blasts deal additional damage.

Description: [Crippling Throw] Crippling Throw will Root enemies hit and will Chain between nearby enemies up to 5 times.
ShortDesc: Crippling Throw now roots and bounces between enemies

Description: [Defiance] Successful hits with your Revolver increase the damage of your next Defiance by 15%, stacking up to 100%.
ShortDesc: Successful hits with Revolver increase the damage of your next Defiance.

Description: [Setback] Setback becomes a lobbed explosive, capable of Rewinding multiple enemies.
ShortDesc: Setback is now a lobbed projectile that explodes

Description: [Crippling Arrow] Crippling Arrow now silences enemies for 2s instead.
ShortDesc: Crippling shot now silences enemies

Description: [Nullify] Double the range at which you can use Nullify.
ShortDesc: Double Nullify's range.

Description: [Retribution] Increase the damage you deal to your Retribution target by 30% and reduce the Cooldown of Retribution by 15s.
ShortDesc: Deal more damage to your Retribution target and reduce the Cooldown of Retribution.

Description: [Dragon Stance] Dragon Stance consumes Health instead of Energy at a rate of 200 Health per second. Dragon Stance requires at least 300 Health to activate and automatically cancels at 15 Health.
ShortDesc: Dragon Stance consumes health instead of energy.

Description: [Weapon] Increase the damage done by Headshots by an additional 25% of base for a total of 175% damage.
ShortDesc: Headshots deal additional damage.

Description: Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 60%.
ShortDesc: Slam talent

Description: [Presence] Increase the damage of Presence by up to 50% based on the range at which it hits and reduce its Cooldown by 4s.
ShortDesc: Presence deals more damage based on range, and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: Reduce your damage taken by 50% while using Juggernaut.
[Net Shot] Increase the damage you deal to targets Slowed by Net Shot by 20% and increases the duration of Net Shot's Slow by 0.5s. The damage increase lasts a minimum of 2s.
ShortDesc: Net Shot grants bonus damage for as long as the target is slowed.

Description: [Dodge Roll] For 8s after using Dodge Roll, your next weapon shot's damage is increased by 30%.
ShortDesc: Deal bonus damage for your next shot after Dodge Roll.

Description: [Pyre Strike] When Pyre Strike hits an enemy champion it stops moving until it ends.
[Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if the Rune is not used the Cooldown is reset.
ShortDesc: Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if not activated the Cooldown resets.

Description: [Weapon] Increase your maximum damage scaling over distance by 60%.
ShortDesc: Increase your Axe's damage.

Description: [Protection] Increase the damage done by allies by 10% while they are Shielded by Protection.
ShortDesc: Allies affected by Protection gain additional damage while shielded.

Description: [Emitter] Increase the Shield granted by Emitter by 1000.
ShortDesc: Increase Emitter's Shield Health.

Description: [Weapon] Deal an additional 200 damage to an enemy if you hit them with all 5 shots of Illusory Mirror.
ShortDesc: Deal increased weapon damage if you hit all 5 shots.

Description: [Armor] Heal for 55% of your maximum Health over 3s when you fall to or below 40% of your maximum Health. This can occur once every 45s.
ShortDesc: Regenerate a portion of your maximum Health when you reach low health.

Description: [Barricade] Increase the maximum Health of Barricade by 2000 and reduce its Cooldown by 3s.
ShortDesc: Barricade gains more Health and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: [Siege Shield] Increase Siege Shield's maximum Health by 2000 and its size by 50%, but reduce its Movement Speed by 80%.
ShortDesc: Siege Shield moves slower, has more Health, and is larger.

Description: [Weapon] Damage dealt when hitting an enemy directly with Rocket Launcher or Salvo is increased by 25%.
ShortDesc: Direct shots deal increased damage.

Description: [Moonlight] Allies being Healed by Moonlight take 15% reduced damage.
[Reversal] Reversal always fires back and does an additional 800 damage.
ShortDesc: Reversal now always fires back and deals more minimum damage.

Description: [Spite] Spite deals 25% of its target's maximum Health with each hit, and Increases your Ultimate charge rate by 15%.
ShortDesc: Spite now deals a portion of the targets maximum Health with every hit, grants Zhin damage immunity, and charges {scale=12.75|.75}% faster.

Description: [Shell Shield] Shell Shield is placed on the ground instead of channeled around you and lasts 2s longer.
ShortDesc: Shell Shield is now placed on the ground, is not Channeled, and lasts longer.

Description: [Combat Slide] Gain Immunity to Crowd Control and reduce your damage taken by 90% while using Combat Slide.
ShortDesc: Gain Damage Reduction and CC Immunity while using Combat Slide.

Description: [Hunter's Mark] Hunter's Mark has 2 charges and grants its benefits to allies.
ShortDesc: Hunter's Mark's damage increase now benefits allies, it's damage increase is stronger, and has a reduced Cooldown.

Description: [Harpoon] Harpoon no longer has a Cooldown, but no longer Slows enemies hit.
[Blast Shot] Blast Shot has its damage increased by 150 and its Cooldown decreased by 2s.
ShortDesc: Increase the damage of Blast Shot and reduce the Cooldown.

Description: [Rune of Travel] Reset the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper when you Teleport using Rune of Travel.
ShortDesc: Rune of Travel now resets the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper

Description: [Ancient Rage] Increase your maximum Health by 500.
ShortDesc: Increase your max health

Description: [Bulwark] Your Shield regenerates at 100% effectiveness even while it is active.
ShortDesc: Your shield recharges while it is raised.

Description: [Shatter] Shatter instantly Heals your target for 700, but its Cooldown is increased by 1s and it no longer explodes your Illusions.
ShortDesc: Shatter now instantly heals your target for 700 health but does not explode Illusions.

Description: [Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] Luna Heals allies around her for 200 per second.
[Astral Mark] Allies affected by your Astral Mark deal 15% increased weapon damage.
ShortDesc: Any ally affected by your Astral Mark also deals more weapon damage.

Description: [Shock Pulse] Your weapon shots reduce the Cooldown of Shock Pulse by 0.5s and Shock Pulse chains 4 additional times.
ShortDesc: Your Weapon Shots reduce the Cooldown of Shock Pulse and Shock Pulse gains extra bounces.

Description: [Mana Rift] Remaining still for 1s creates a Mana Rift around you that generates Mana every 1s. Leaving the Mana Rift destroys it.
[Healing Potion] Healing Potion's Healing is increased by 100%.
ShortDesc: Healing Potion heals allies for more.

Description: [Nade Launcher] Nade Launcher has 3 charges.
ShortDesc: Nade Launcher now has 3 charges

Description: [Restore Soul] Increase the range of Restore Soul by 300% and its duration by 1s.
ShortDesc: Increase the range and duration of Restore Soul.

Description: [Earthen Guard] Reduce your damage taken by 20% and gain Immunity to Crowd Control while Earthen Guard is active.
ShortDesc: Earthen Guard gains increased Damage Reduction and now grants CC Immunity.

Description: [Dead Zone] Dead Zone damage is increased to 500.
ShortDesc: Dead Zone now deals more damage when the initial explosion hits an enemy.

Description: [Stealth] Reduce the rate of Stealth Energy consumption by 50%.
ShortDesc: Your Stealth bar consumes slower.

Description: [True Power] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 15% and enemies at or below 65% Health are Revealed to you.
ShortDesc: Targets below 65% Health are revealed to you and your Ultimate charge rate is increased.

Description: [Weapon] After firing continuously for 2s, gain 10% increased damage.
ShortDesc: Deal increased damage after firing for 2s.

Description: [Soar] Increase the damage you deal with your weapon shots by 20% for 3s after Soar ends.
ShortDesc: Deal more damage after Soar ends.

Description: [Dredge Anchor] For 4s after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor, your next weapon shot against that enemy deals 75% increased damage.
ShortDesc: Gain bonus damage on your first shot after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor.

Description: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with Heirloom Rifle increases your Heirloom Rifle damage against that enemy by 7% for 3s, stacking up to 4 times.
Bladed Chakrams are able to bounce 2 additional times before disappearing.
[Armor] Killing Blows reset your Cooldowns and Heal you for 500.
ShortDesc: Killing an enemy resets all your Cooldowns and heals you.

Description: [Pyromania] Successfully landing two Pyre Balls will cause the next Pyre Ball thrown after the second hit to explode in a 30-unit-radius area.
[Blossom] Allies Healed by Blossom will Heal for an additional 300 over 3s.
ShortDesc: Healing allies with Blossom will heal them for an additional amount over time.

Description: [Weapon] Increase the rate at which your Longbow charges by 25%.
ShortDesc: Draw your bow faster.

Description: [Transporter] Using Transporter instantly Teleports you to its target location.
ShortDesc: Transporter is now instant

Description: [Shatter] If an Illusion is killed or expires, it triggers a Shatter explosion, dealing 500 damage.
ShortDesc: If an Illusion is killed or expires, it triggers a Shatter explosion.

Description: [Mending Spirits] Your Gourd no longer damages enemies, but it Heals for twice as much.
ShortDesc: Gourd no longer damages enemies, but it's Healing effects are doubled

Description: [Missile Launcher] Increase the radius of Missile Launcher's explosions by 66%.
ShortDesc: Increase the area of effectiveness of missile launcher explosions

Description: [Armor] Increase the damage done by Pounce by 10% and reset Pounce's Cooldown after earning an Elimination.
ShortDesc: Eliminations reset the Cooldown of Pounce and Pounce deals more damage.

Description: [Weapon] Increase the radius of Sticky Bombs' explosions by 20%.
ShortDesc: Increase the explosion size of Sticky Bombs.

Description: [Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] If Io falls below 200 Health while Luna is active, she trades places with Luna, Heals for 50% of her Health, and Luna dies in her stead.
[Crippling Arrow] Crippling Arrow now explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on contact, dealing 300 additional damage to enemies hit.
ShortDesc: Impaler Arrow now explodes on contact for additional damage and knocks back all enemies in the radius, but can no longer stun.

Description: [Fireball] Increase the damage of Fireball by 30% and deal 20% increased damage for each subsequent target hit after the first.
ShortDesc: Fireball deals more damage and even more for each subsequent target hit.

Description: [Seedling] Increase the damage of each Seedling to 750 and reduce the time it takes for them to explode by 25%.
ShortDesc: Increased the damage of each seedling and reduce their fuse time.

Description: [Weapon] The projectile launched by reloading your Cursed Howitzer explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on contact.
[Frag Grenade] Increase the radius of Frag Grenade's explosion by 40%.
ShortDesc: Frag Grenade has larger AoE.

Description: [Weapon] Your weapon shots travel 50% faster and 100% farther, but no longer explode.
ShortDesc: Fire more slowly but deal more damage.

Description: [Smoke Screen] Benefits from Smoke Screen cards in your loadout now also benefit allies who enter Smoke Screen. Additionally, allies are Healed for 150 every 1s while in your Smoke Screen.
ShortDesc: [Smoke Screen] Smoke Screen card benefits now also affect allies

Description: [Billow] Heal for 15% of your maximum Health per second while using Billow.
ShortDesc: Heal a percent of your maximum Health during Billow.

Description: [Armor] When you get an Elimination, drop a Health Pack that Heals the champion who picks it up for 600. Health Packs are visible to allies and are not able to be seen or interacted with by the opposing team.
ShortDesc: Eliminations leave Health Drops that heal you for or your teammate when picked up

Description: [Ice Storm] Ice Storm has its damage increased by 100% and its Ultimate charge decreased by 50%, but its duration is reduced to 3s.
ShortDesc: Ice Storm deals more damage and costs less energy, but doesn't last as long.

Description: [Pyre Strike] When Pyre Strike comes in contact with an ally it will stop and Heal anyone in its beam for 150 every 0.05s. Also reduces the speed of Pyre Strike by 30%.
[Rend Soul] Each Soul Charge you detonate with Rend Soul increases your maximum Health and weapon damage by 2% until you die. Stacks up to 15 times.
ShortDesc: Each Soul Charge you detonate increases your Base Health and Weapon Damage until you die. Stacks up to 15 times.

Description: [Mending Spirits] Mending Spirits immediately Heals your target for an additional 220.
ShortDesc: Mending Spirits heals additional Health upfront.

Description: [Weapon] Hitting allies with your Lightning Staff Heals them for 600 per second.
ShortDesc: Your Lightning staff now heals allies.

Description: [Splitting Ice] Frost Bolt Chains to a nearby enemy within 30 units, dealing 350 damage.
ShortDesc: Frost Bolt bounces

Description: [Mark of Fate] Decrease the percentage of Healing given to Marked targets by 15%, but you can have two Marks out at a time.
[Sniper Mode] For 7s after hitting a fully-charged weapon shot, your next fully-charged shot will deal an additional 30% damage.
ShortDesc: Consecutive fully charged shots deal more damage.

Description: [Weapon] Increase your Attack Speed by 40%, but reduce your damage-per-shot by 25%.
[Pounce] Pounce Executes targets at or below 35% Health.
ShortDesc: Pounce executes targets below 35% health.

Description: [Projection] Enemies hit by Projection are stunned for 1s and any enemy caught between your Projection and you when you Teleport takes 600 damage.
Allies in a 40-Unit radius around you heal 100 health with each Soul Harvested.
[Armor] The Health of Deflector Shield is increased by 350 and its Cooldown is reduced by half if it is destroyed by an enemy.
ShortDesc: CD of deflector shield is halved if destroyed, 9s icd; increase shield health by 350

Description: [Stasis Field] Greatly increase the size of Stasis Field, but its Cooldown is increased by 50%.
ShortDesc: Statis Field is larger but has a longer cooldown.

Description: [Protection] Increase Protection's Shield Health by 500.
ShortDesc: Increase the strength of Protection Shield

Description: [Void Grip] Enemies affected by Void Grip are Crippled and take an additional 480 damage over its duration.
ShortDesc: Enemies affected by Void Grip are crippled and take additional damage over its duration.

Description: Heavy Blade now explodes on reactivation instead of recalling, but the initial throw does reduced damage.
[Weapon] Modify your Blunderbuss to fire a single slug that deals 480 damage.
ShortDesc: Blunderbuss now fires a slug.

Description: [Scamper] Using Scamper Heals allies within 25 units and you for 600 over 3s.
ShortDesc: using scamper applies a HoT to yourself and nearby allies

Description: [Healing Totem] Gain a third charge of Healing Totem and increase their healing by 20%.
ShortDesc: Allies healed by Healing Totem receive CC Immunity and Healing Totem heals for more.

Description: [Warder's Field] The radius of Warder's Field is increased by 50% and it Cripples enemies within it.
ShortDesc: Warder's Field has increased radius and now cripples.

Description: [Impasse] Impasse now has 2 charges and its Cooldown is reduced to 12s, but you are unable to destroy your walls.
ShortDesc: Impasse has 2 charges and reduced cooldown, but can't get rid of walls

Description: [Flare] Flare deals 250% base damage, has significantly increased Projectile Speed, and has its Cooldown reduced by 10s, but no longer Reveals enemies.
ShortDesc: Flare deals more Damage, its Projectile Speed is increased, and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: [Armor] Reduce the damage you take by 20% while at or below 40% Health.
ShortDesc: Gain Damage Reduction at low health.

Description: [Second Chance] Activating Second Chance leaves behind an unstable fissure that explodes after 3s, dealing 900 damage.
Crouching Tigron now deals 700 damage in a 20-unit-radius area on landing.
[Commander's Grab] Targets hit by Commander's Grab are Stunned for an additional 2s.
ShortDesc: Victim's of Commander's Grab are stunned for an additional 2s.

Description: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed while using your Booster.
ShortDesc: Empowered Booster.

Description: [Weapon] Tossing your snake after reloading is faster and deals an additional 500 damage.
ShortDesc: Snake Toss deals additional damage.

Description: [Blink] Blink can be refired within 4s of its use to return to the initial casting location.
ShortDesc: Blink may be used a second time within 4s to return to the initial casting location

Description: [Weapon] Your heavy hit with Inferno Blade deals an additional 150 damage.
ShortDesc: Your heavy swing is empowered.

Description: [Shield] Your Shield has an infinite duration and its Cooldown is reduced by 2s.
ShortDesc: Your Shield has an infinite Duration
